Purpose: To process, cultivate, and identify microorganisms in stool and urine specimens using aerobic culture methods for diagnostic reporting.
Container: Sterile stool collection container or sterile midstream urine cup
Equipment: Incubators (35-37Â°C), agar media (MacConkey, Blood, Mannitol Salt, CHROMagar Orientation), peptone water, sterile inoculating loops, microscope, Gram stain reagents, biochemical test kits/API strips, antibiotic susceptibility testing system
